org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils

Class CertificateChainFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.utils.CertificateChainFetcher

  • public class CertificateChainFetcher
extends Object
    Obtains the certificate chain for an arbitrary SSL service. Maintains a cache.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

      • getTrustsForURI

        public List<X509Certificate> getTrustsForURI(URI uri)
                                      throws IOException,
                                             GeneralSecurityException
        Gets the certificate chain for a service identified by URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI of the (secure) service to identify.
        Returns:
        The certificate chain. Will be null if the service is not secure.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the service is unreachable or other connection problems occur.
        GeneralSecurityException - If any of a number of security-related problems occur, such as an inability to match detailed security protocols.

      • flushCache

        public void flushCache()
        Flushes the cache.
